accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

$block:
This object contains information used to
configure [eNote][eNote] functionality.
To use eNote, the Allow eNote for eOriginal account plan item must be on,
and the Connect configuration for eOriginal must be set correctly.

[eNote]: https://support.docusign.com/s/document-item?language=en_US&rsc_301&bundleId=pik1583277475390&topicId=tsn1583277394951.html&_LANG=enus

$ul: **connectConfigured**: When **false,** the user must configure Connect and eOriginal for the integration to work.
**eNoteConfigured**: When **false,** the user must configure eNote for the feature to work.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
